name: Equilibrium (itch) (finfin)
description:
How far are you willing to go to make your life easier?  What consequences can arise following poor decisions? Equilibrium will force you to answer these questions.

Every single one of the players actions will impact the route they take and ultimately change how the player progresses. There are seven endings (which is why the game had to be  so short), so your route will be unique to your decisions.

Equilibrium is an extremely short, decision making game made for the MGDP gamejam in around two weeks my a single developer. Although it is extremely short I had alot of fun making it, and i would like to think I've learnt a  thing or two.
